EvaluationSection.TargetStarHint: Select the star rating targeted for this tourist classification.
EvaluationSection.FloorsError: Please enter a valid number of floors (0 or more).
EvaluationSection.ConstraintsHint: Check applicable constraints — they dynamically adjust the criteria grid.
EvaluationSection.ZoneBlanche: Property is in a white zone (no coverage)
EvaluationSection.DromTom: Property is located in the French Overseas Territories
EvaluationSection.HauteMontagne: Property is in high mountain area or Saint-Pierre-et-Miquelon

EvaluationSection.StationnementImpossible: Parking within 300 m is impossible due to regulations
EvaluationSection.SmallestRoomError: The smallest bedroom cannot exceed the total bedrooms area.
EvaluationSection.FieldRequired: This field is required and must be greater than 0.
EvaluationSection.FormInvalid: Please fix the errors before continuing.
EvaluationSection.NoCriteriaFound: No criteria found for this star rating.
EvaluationSection.SaveApiError: Database save failed. Draft kept locally.
EvaluationSection.SaveRestored: Draft restored from your last session.
EvaluationSection.ResultAcceptedHint: The property meets all required criteria for {{star}}-star classification.
EvaluationSection.ResultRefusedHint: The property does not meet all required criteria for {{star}}-star classification.
EvaluationSection.ResultMandatoryHint: Threshold of 95% on a total of {{total}} points.
EvaluationSection.ResultOncFail: {{count}} ONC criterion(a) not validated — all are mandatory.
EvaluationSection.ResultOptionalHint: Minimum required: {{min}} pts + bonus {{bonus}} pts ({{missing}} missing mandatory pts × 3) out of {{total}} available pts.
